title: Wings of a Soulmate
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://archiveofourown.org/works/19258402

by ReginaNocis

Carol Danvers was a pro at running from her problems, but they all have to catch up to her eventually.

Words: 1294, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 45 of Obscure Love

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Captain Marvel (2019)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M, F/F
  • Characters: Carol Danvers, Monica Rambeau, Sam Wilson, Tony Stark (mentioned), Maria Rambeau (mentioned), Nick Fury (mentioned)
  • Relationships: Carol Danvers/Sam Wilson, Carol Danvers/Maria Rambeau (past), Darcy Lewis/Monica Rambeau (Mentioned)
  • Additional Tags: Major Endgame Spoilers, SPOILERS!!!!!!, You Have Been Warned, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Totally a fix-it, I couldn’t resist, Alternate Universe - Soulmates, Cree technology for the win!!

title: Learning to Fly
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://archiveofourown.org/works/19258363

by Slothbeans

As much as Peter wants to return to dreamland, he can’t help but find the activity calming with mother so close. His whole body purrs as his mother holds him close and works through his down. He finds his wings naturally relaxing and opening up to the idea of a new day as his eyes open up too. He tucks his wings out of the way and enjoys as his mother plays with his messy curls for just a bit longer.

“My little angel,” Pepper hums. Her wings ruffle around her in solidarity. It’s a nickname she rarely gets to use with Peter’s father so on edge about their species, but she really does feel a special bond sharing this gift between them. Angels are rare enough. Two angels in a single family are statistically impossible.

Words: 5432, Chapters: ¼, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of Broken Wings

  • Fandoms: Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man - All Media Types, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Marvel
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Ned Leeds
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Pepper Potts, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Ned Leeds & Peter Parker
  • Additional Tags: Peter Parker is Tony Stark’s Biological Child, Fluff, Love, Family, Platonic Cuddling, Platonic Soulmates, Alternate Universe, Angels, Alternate Universe - Angels, Alternate Universe - Guardian Angels, Wings, Angel Wings, Alternate Universe - Wings, Destiny, Fate & Destiny, School, Best Friends, Young Peter Parker

blog.name: elisaphoenix13
blog.title: Elisa
blog.description: Female, 26, and sneezing out fanfiction one after the other for your entertainment. (paypal.me/elisaphoenix13) The start of the Mama Bear Stephen Strange revolution.

summary:
*Peter throws junk food in the cart*
Stephen: ...Peter...
Peter: You said I could get whetever I want! 
Tony: You eat like an...
body:
*Peter throws junk food in the cart*

Stephen: …Peter…

Peter: You said I could get whetever I want!

Tony: You eat like an eight-year-old!

Peter: At least I’m not picky like one!

Stephen: That’s true.

Tony: You’re our own personal human garbage disposal.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: lovelyirony

blog.description: icon by starkxs. name is jess, please send in a full prompt! thanks so much for stopping by, I appreciate it!

tags: fjaf;lj;lkfjksdaf yeah i'm still salty @ steve
summary: "New" by Ben Platt is stevetony post cacw
question: "New" by Ben Platt is stevetony post cacw
answer:
Tony feels elated one night. One night, after so much heartbreak and pain. Because he just had dinner with Rhodey, Happy, May, Pepper, and Peter and it was great. They laughed about a story Peter told about being Spidey, and that had reminded Rhodey of the time he had pulled a campus-wide prank on the worst professor at MIT involving silly string and old textbooks. 

And Tony? He hadn’t thought of Steve once. He hadn’t looked over to his right–always to his right, Steve had always elected to sit there because I’m your Mr. Right, sweetheart–and Tony hadn’t gotten a sad look on his face. 

He thought of it in his room, blinks, and walks out. 

“I need to go shopping,” Tony tells Pepper and May, who have been on an interior design kick. “Bedroom needs a change.” They both get the widest grins as they look at each other. 

“So I’m thinking no orange–” 

“Definitely not May, are you insane–” 

“But maybe we could kind of have a fun design? I don’t want dark colors or anything, so…” 

“Ooh, Tony, how do you feel about yellow and gray?” 

“I am not turning my room bumblebee theme, you know that, Pepper–” 

“Just a suggestion!” 

They actually end up at a consignment shop. Tony finds an old quilt, obviously loved as he traces the stitching. 

The new room theme is comfy. He has soft quilts and softer carpet, pillows of red and yellow everywhere. Pepper and May tease him. Rhodey gets him fun paintings that he thinks are “the worst art ever.” 

Even Happy gets in on it, dressing Tony’s bathroom up with “wine mom sayings.” Peter laughs so hard he cries as he documents it. 

“I think I have the best bathroom in New York,” Tony says with a sniff. 

He goes to bed that night, and he’s not staring over at his right side, where there should’ve been a chest rising and falling in easy sleep. 

He thinks of Pepper laughing as she picks out one pillow with the cute little Iron Man face, and May’s eyes lighting up when she found the gray comforter that felt more like a cloud than anything. 

He bonds more with the family around him, meets new people. And god, it feels great. 

Tony Stark is a brand new person. And god help anyone who threatens to ruin that.

reblog.comment:
Tony feels elated one night. One night, after so much heartbreak and pain. Because he just had dinner with Rhodey, Happy, May, Pepper, and Peter and it was great. They laughed about a story Peter told about being Spidey, and that had reminded Rhodey of the time he had pulled a campus-wide prank on the worst professor at MIT involving silly string and old textbooks. 

And Tony? He hadn’t thought of Steve once. He hadn’t looked over to his right–always to his right, Steve had always elected to sit there because I’m your Mr. Right, sweetheart–and Tony hadn’t gotten a sad look on his face. 

He thought of it in his room, blinks, and walks out. 

“I need to go shopping,” Tony tells Pepper and May, who have been on an interior design kick. “Bedroom needs a change.” They both get the widest grins as they look at each other. 

“So I’m thinking no orange–” 

“Definitely not May, are you insane–” 

“But maybe we could kind of have a fun design? I don’t want dark colors or anything, so…” 

“Ooh, Tony, how do you feel about yellow and gray?” 

“I am not turning my room bumblebee theme, you know that, Pepper–” 

“Just a suggestion!”

He bonds more with the family around him, meets new people. And god, it feels great. 

Tony Stark is a brand new person. And god help anyone who threatens to ruin that.

summary: “You’re not facing them alone, Tony.” A follow-up of sorts to this. This was based on the first chapter of a Wild West-inspired...
caption:
“You’re not facing them alone, Tony.”

A follow-up of sorts to this. This was based on the first chapter of a Wild West-inspired MCU fanfic by my good friend, and it’s AMAZING! I made this to go along with her first chapter and hopefully gather enough interest in it that she feels confident to share it with the world.

Let’s say she’s sort of re-writing the events of Civil War as if it took place in the Old West, and with an added ironstrange angle.

IT’S GOOD, TRUST ME! Please help me spread the word about it so that I can show her there are people interested in reading it.

… and I hope you like the art too. I tried to make it reminiscent of an old photograph. ^^

summary:
Me: *after IW* Tony is going to die this time next year :( :( :(
Me: *further into summer* he is going to die omg no.
Me: *After...
body:
Me: *after IW* Tony is going to die this time next year :( :( :(

Me: *further into summer* he is going to die omg no.

Me: *After the first trailer* shit he’s going to die.

Me: *after the second trailer* oh damn. he dead.

Me: *after the rain of tv spots* fuck. he’s going to fucking die.

Me: *after RDJ cried at the press tour* Fuck. Tony is going to fucking die. Fucking fuck.

Me: *sitting in the theater* FUCKING FUCK!!! HE’S FUCKING GOING TO FUCKING DIE. FUCKING FUCKETY FUCK.

Tony: *dies*

summary: You Will Know When It's Time
title: You Will Know When It's Time
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WKn736

by WhumptyDumpty

When approached by Doctor Strange, Peter is given the opportunity to find Mr. Stark in another universe and bring him back to his own- but he doesn’t entirely agree with the motives to do so.

Words: 2694, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man - All Media Types, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Iron Man (Comics), Doctor Strange (2016), The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Ned Leeds, Harley Keener, Morgan Stark (Marvel Cinematic Universe), May Parker (Spider-Man), Pepper Potts
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Tony Stark & Stephen Strange, Harley Keener & Tony Stark, Harley Keener & Peter Parker, Peter Parker & Morgan Stark (Marvel Cinematic Universe) & Tony Stark, Ned Leeds & Peter Parker & Tony Stark

blog.name: shepickedyoutotakeme
blog.title: Not a Knight
blog.description:
You can find most of my OUAT writing   
 Here

tags: and we all know that was bullshit
title: An Endgame rewrite idea
body:
So obviously Natasha and Clint being on that cliff in Vormir is unacceptable for many, many reasons.

One of which is they sent two people most trained in stealth to Space instead of somewhere they’re meant to not be noticed, while sending the most noticeable ones to somewhere they needed to be unnoticed.

Clint and Natasha should have been switched with Tony and Bruce, with our assassin Duo going to New York and the Science Bros to Vormir.

Tony and Bruce were the science bros, Bruce was the only one who canonly lived at the tower, they cared about each other.

Bruce died they thought and it was a whole ordeal, they had their stunned meet up in Infinity War, and we don’t see more.

Then Endgame they might not be the closest but they’re still friends, right? Probably still care for each other.

Imagine on that cliff introducing though the conflict of yes, Tony has a family and that now, but Bruce barely finally has PEACE and can live without fear.

Bruce who has never been able to just live like this where people like him and care for him, and he’s not constantly worried about the other guy.

Bruce who’d probably sacrifice himself for Tony and his family, and in the name of saving the world, but!

Hulk and Bruce used to be separate entities sharing a body.

Hulk will NOT let Bruce die.

So… How would Bruce plummeting off that cliff work?

Would he die?

COULD he die?

Would it only kill Banner and leave behind Hulk?

Would it kill Hulk and leave behind a confused Bruce?

Given the Vormir cliff bullshit isn’t even comic canon to begin with and just something put out into the movie for reasons to kill and drama, I think it would be much more interesting and not just bullshit kill off the girl two movies in a row for shock and man pain.

Bruce who has never been able to just live like this where people like him and care for him, and he’s not constantly worried about the other guy.

Bruce who’d probably sacrifice himself for Tony and his family, and in the name of saving the world, but!

Hulk and Bruce used to be separate entities sharing a body.

Hulk will NOT let Bruce die.

So… How would Bruce plummeting off that cliff work?

Would he die?

COULD he die?

Would it only kill Banner and leave behind Hulk?

Would it kill Hulk and leave behind a confused Bruce?

Given the Vormir cliff bullshit isn’t even comic canon to begin with and just something put out into the movie for reasons to kill and drama, I think it would be much more interesting and not just bullshit kill off the girl two movies in a row for shock and man pain.
trail.content:
So obviously Natasha and Clint being on that cliff in Vormir is unacceptable for many, many reasons.

One of which is they sent two people most trained in stealth to Space instead of somewhere they’re meant to not be noticed, while sending the most noticeable ones to somewhere they needed to be unnoticed.

Clint and Natasha should have been switched with Tony and Bruce, with our assassin Duo going to New York and the Science Bros to Vormir.

Tony and Bruce were the science bros, Bruce was the only one who canonly lived at the tower, they cared about each other.

Bruce died they thought and it was a whole ordeal, they had their stunned meet up in Infinity War, and we don’t see more.

Then Endgame they might not be the closest but they’re still friends, right? Probably still care for each other.

Imagine on that cliff introducing though the conflict of yes, Tony has a family and that now, but Bruce barely finally has PEACE and can live without fear.

Bruce who has never been able to just live like this where people like him and care for him, and he’s not constantly worried about the other guy.

Bruce who’d probably sacrifice himself for Tony and his family, and in the name of saving the world, but!

Hulk and Bruce used to be separate entities sharing a body.

Hulk will NOT let Bruce die.

So… How would Bruce plummeting off that cliff work?

Would he die?

COULD he die?

Would it only kill Banner and leave behind Hulk?

Would it kill Hulk and leave behind a confused Bruce?

Given the Vormir cliff bullshit isn’t even comic canon to begin with and just something put out into the movie for reasons to kill and drama, I think it would be much more interesting and not just bullshit kill off the girl two movies in a row for shock and man pain.

body:
3,500 Followers Celebration!!

First, I would just like to say thank you to all of you for following me for this long. I don’t deserve any of you, but I’m so grateful for all of you! If any of you need someone to talk to, I’ll be here.

Now, for the celebration part. I will be answering asks as best as I can (there are obviously some questions that I can’t/won’t answer). So, if anyone wants to send an ask, go ahead :)

Thank you all so much again!!!!!!

You all are amazing! Don’t doubt that💙💚❤

title: With you I feel whole
body:
by MaryBarrens

„Políbil mě,“ řekne Tony tiše. „Steve. Políbil mě.“

Bucky pár vteřin neřekne ani slovo, jako by ho vůbec neslyšel. „Dobře,“ řekne potom jemně, jeho hlas dokonale klidný.

Words: 6973, Chapters: 1/1, Language: Čeština

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Captain America (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Mature
